Uses of Package
org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

  • Packages that use org.ctoolkit.restapi.client 
    Package Description
    org.ctoolkit.restapi.client  
    org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.adaptee  
    org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.provider  
  • Classes in org.ctoolkit.restapi.client used by org.ctoolkit.restapi.client 
    Class and Description
    ApiCredential
    The API credential holder represents a map of credential used to authenticate client calls to APIs.
    DeleteIdentification
    The extended action to provide specific IdentificationAction for delete operation.
    DownloadMediaProvider
    The request wrapper provider in form of single instance which can later ask for a content of concrete resource to be downloaded.
    HttpFailureException
    The base class as runtime exception for all HTTP status codes that represents a failure.
    IdentificationAction
    The single fluent action where concrete resource type has been already provided.
    Identifier
    The resource identifier with possibility to express parent child relationship.
    ListRetrievalRequest
    The extended Request to provide retrieval specific API to work with list of resources.
    PayloadRequest
    The extended Request to provide additional flow actions for requests having payload.
    Request
    The top level request wrapper to provide possibility to isolate a remote call to standalone object.
    RequestCredential
    The request credential class with convenience methods to access credential and configuration.
    RetrievalRequest
    The extended Request to provide single retrieval specific API.
    SimpleRequest
    The Request API for light request doesn't require any specific configuration.
    SingleDownloadMediaRequest
    The single media request as wrapper of media content to download.
    SingleRetrievalIdentification
    The extended action to provide specific IdentificationAction for single resource retrieval.
    SingleUploadMediaRequest
    The upload media request as a wrapper of data and associated (metadata) resource.
    UnauthorizedException
    The unauthorized exception thrown once the request requires user authentication.
    UpdateIdentification
    The extended action to provide specific IdentificationAction for update operation.
    UploadMediaProvider
    The request wrapper provider in form of single instance which can later ask to upload given content of the concrete resource.
  • Classes in org.ctoolkit.restapi.client used by org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.adaptee 
    Class and Description
    Identifier
    The resource identifier with possibility to express parent child relationship.
  • Classes in org.ctoolkit.restapi.client used by org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.provider 
    Class and Description
    Identifier
    The resource identifier with possibility to express parent child relationship.
